title: Can't search Match History on website via Firefox
body: Whether logged into the site or not, I cannot use the search function to find another player's match history.  Usually i'll come to the site not logged in to find my own, but when i press enter or click on the magnifying glass to initiate a search, simply nothing happens - the page doesn't even try to load.  If i log in i can easily view my own match history, but the search bar at the top of that page is still unusable.  Does anyone else who uses firefox encounter this issue?

replies.body:
Does this only happen with Firefox, or do you experience this on other browsers as well? Try clearing your browser's cache using [our guide here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)

Let me know if anything changes.

Sorry for late reply.  It was a firefox-only issue and clearing the cache did not help.  I was reluctant to find the most-likely cause of a clashing add-on since I have so many, but i finally gave and did just that.  After lots of browser restarting, i found this addon to be the issue https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/open-bookmarks-in-new-tab/?src=ss  I'm still going to use it, but at least i'll know what i must do to view match history from now on.
